snippet: The Detroit Pistons could have folded when center Andre Drummond was ejected in the second quarter....
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Pistons could have folded when center Andre Drummond was ejected in the second quarter.

headline.main: Harris Scores 24, Pistons Blow Past Hornets 112-89
